meanings.definition: Giving a feeling of comfort, warmth, and relaxation.
meanings.sent1: The blanket was the coziest thing I had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: Her room was the coziest in the house, with soft pillows and warm colors.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the coziest spot in the sun to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: The coziest memory from my childhood is snuggling with my grandma by the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The coziest sweater I own feels like a warm hug on a chilly day.

meanings.sent1: After trying many blankets, she finally found the coziest for her bed.
meanings.sent2: The coziest in the room won a prize for their exceptional comfort.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the coziest spot by the fireplace was fierce among the siblings.
meanings.sent4: The coziest of all the blankets was the one knitted by grandma with love.
meanings.sent5: In the cozy cabin, everyone fought for the coziest corner to read their books.
